mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sms_history (task_id, target_number, message_content, media_urls, message_to, message_from, sent_at, status, `read`) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{targetNumber}, #{messageContent}, #{mediaUrls}, #{messageTo}, #{messageFrom}, #{sentAt}, #{status}, #{read})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sms_history WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND `read` = 0

SELECT sh.target_number AS targetNumber, sh.message_content AS latestMessage, DATE_FORMAT(sh.sent_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS latestTime, COALESCE(unread.unread_count, 0) AS unreadCount FROM sms_history sh INNER JOIN ( SELECT target_number, MAX(sent_at) AS latest_time FROM sms_history WHERE task_id = #{taskId} GROUP BY target_number ) latest ON sh.target_number = latest.target_number AND sh.sent_at = latest.latest_time LEFT JOIN ( SELECT target_number, COUNT(1) AS unread_count FROM sms_history WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND read = 0 GROUP BY target_number ) unread ON unread.target_number = sh.target_number WHERE sh.task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY sh.sent_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT id AS messageId, message_content AS messageContent, media_urls AS mediaUrls, message_to AS messageTo, message_from AS messageFrom, DATE_FORMAT(sent_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS sendAt, status FROM sms_history WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND target_number = #{targetNumber} ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
